description.lang: The in-wall smart switch is a Z-Wave device designed to work with various types of light sources. It may be connected to two-wire or three-wire configuration so it can operate with or without neutral lead. The switch can switch ON/OFF connected light source either through Z-Wave devices or through the wall switch connected directly to it.The switch can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.

1. When press and hold down Reset button for 10S to resetthe switch, send u0022Device Reset Locally Notification CCu0022 toassociated devices of this group to report factory resetinformation.2. When load state changes, send u0022Basic Report CCu0022 toassociated devices of this group.3. When over temperature is detected, send Emergencyshutoff statusu0022 to Lifeline.

name.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report

description.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed (When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically

name.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network

description.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network (when enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a network)
